gen:link.msg:message: `EquityMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDesignatedFundPublicMovementSpecificationEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDesignatedFundPublicMovementSpecificationEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDesignatedFundPublicMovementSpecificationEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDesignatedFundPublicMovementSpecificationEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityDesignatedFundPublicMovementSpecificationEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityDesignatedFundPublicMovementSpecificationEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
